attributes.action: Hold a second referendum on EU membership
attributes.additional_details: Almost half votes polled in the referendum were not to leave the EU. Since then these remainers have barely had a voice. Analysis of the BBC discussions.
attributes.background: A referendum result is not binding. It is merely an expression of opinion at a moment in time. The 2016 referendum result was tainted by misleading promises. Negotiations with the EU prove this.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what options you would like on a further referendum.  You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246157
